scripts.test: npm run scripts || npm run posttest
scripts.clean:reports: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.chrome:desktop:test: npm run pretest && npm run chrome:desktop:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.chrome:mobile:test: npm run pretest && npm run chrome:mobile:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.firefox:mobile:test: npm run pretest && npm run firefox:mobile:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.firefox:desktop:test: npm run pretest && npm run firefox:desktop:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.electron:desktop:test: npm run pretest && npm run electron:desktop:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.electron:mobile:test: npm run pretest && npm run electron:mobile:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.edge:desktop:test: npm run pretest && npm run edge:desktop:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.edge:mobile:test: npm run pretest && npm run edge:mobile:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.webkit:desktop:test: npm run pretest && npm run webkit:desktop:scripts && npm run posttest
scripts.webkit:mobile:test: npm run pretest && npm run webkit:mobile:scripts && npm run posttest
